item.title: Prelude
item.description:
Testing, one, two.

Today I’m happy to announce that I’m back with a new site, new blogging platform and a new URL. I’m now live on dcrichards.com which is complete with a nice hip scrolling site which I’ve been working on and now a new blog, which you’re currently reading.

Stay tuned, there’s more coming soon…
